entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
